features: ⭐180ML HIGH CAPACITY & EASY TO USE - Brookline Steamer for clothes with an innovative nozzle design is powered by 800 W produces 10 minutes of continuous desired temperature steaming. This handheld steamer is easy to move around with 9ft extra-long cord.

✅COMPACT DESIGN & TRAVEL-FRIENDLY - Forget about bulk and heavy steamers! Get our portable fabric steamer device and enjoy the hassle-free traveling. Light-weight and small size makes it ideal for travel. Easily fit on your hand carry luggage. NOTE: USE OUR BROOKLINE STEAMER WITH FACE UP, OTHERWISE IT MAY LEAK OUT.

😍SUPERIOR WRINKLE REMOVER – Powerful Clothes Steamer, Highly Effective and Gentle for all kinds of garments or fabric. Instantly erase all stubborn wrinkles From your favorite suit, shirt and dress. Works great on delicate drapery and even beddings. Perfect For Last-minute Ironing Emergencies. Save Time and money. Don’t let annoying creases ruin your events or trips.

👉SAFE AND EASY TO USE - The steamer is designed with full security guidelines. The automatic shut-down system whenever the steamer is too hot or the water level is too low keeps you safe from every kind of accident.

💯POWERFUL STEAMING WITH 1 YEAR WARRANTY - Our garment steamer heats up in less than 2 minutes to produce intense steam. It is manufactured Under Strict Safety Guidelines and is backed by 1 year warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight, heats up FAST & works great!
reviews.reviewText: Hands down the best impulse buy I’ve made in a long time. I am OBSESSED with this thing! It is perfect for getting wrinkles out of outfits that have been packed a little too long in your carryon bag. It’s super light weight and the directions claim it starts steaming in 2 minutes but it’s definitely ready to go in half that time. Just mind the max fill line because it will spit out HOT water if you go past it but that’s just user error. It also advertises that you can use it on curtains and while this certainly would work on them quite well, you’d probably have to refill it every other panel so if you’re looking for something that can handle those jobs, you may want to get one that has a larger water tank capacity. I still give this thing a 10 out of 10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get wrinkles out fast
reviews.reviewText: I used it to get wrinkles out of a ruffled kimonoI was afraid till I used the steamer, that the ruffles would be flat and wrinkled. But the steamer worked great. I did several garments. Loved it and I’m picky.

reviews.reviewText: This worked very well on my formal dresses and even cotton tshirts. super quick to set up and get steaming. also light weight and doesn't leak on your clothes.

reviews.reviewText: Heats up very quickly and does a great job of getting the wrinkles out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars SO cheaply made
reviews.reviewText: I don’t write many reviews on Amazon, but I’m so irritated by this purchase, I felt compelled to warn others.I had a similar-sized steamer that broke (I dropped it, not the product’s fault!) and was about to re-purchase it, when I spotted this steamer for slightly cheaper. I bought it and man, was that a mistake. I didn’t need to use it for a while, so the return window had passed by the time I realized it was awful, so now I’m stuck with it.Pros:None. I guess the cute color? Maybe?Cons:-INCREDIBLY cheaply made. I took photos but they don’t really show how cheap this plastic is. Just getting the top off and on to put the water in is nearly impossible, because the plastic tabs that are supposed to lock into place were so cheaply manufactured, they don’t fit well.-Takes forever to heat up.-Far more importantly than either of the above- it spits hot water out all over you and whatever you are trying to steam. I have attempted to use it on 5 occasions. Every time, the garment is soaking wet and my arms are splattered with water.I wasn’t expecting perfection for 27 bucks, but this misses the mark on every level. Please don’t spend your money on this. It’s my own fault I didn’t test it within the return window, but it’s annoying to be stuck with it. Due to the potential burn hazards, I don’t even feel like I can donate it. I’ll have to throw it away, and I hate waste.
